name: @hawa/loader
description: Support assets list input file type

scripts.start: babel --root-mode upward src --watch --out-dir dist --source-maps inline --copy-files --ignore spec.js,spec.jsx
scripts.build: babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir dist --source-maps inline --copy-files --ignore spec.js,spec.jsx

author: Kir Burkhanov
